summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.p1: I currently serve as an IT teacher at a private primary school. At the same time, I work as a Python and Artificial Intelligence instructor at an IT training center. I am continuously improving myself with the goal of specializing in the EdTech field.
summary.p2: I use modern teaching methods and tools to develop my students' digital literacy skills and prepare them for the technologies of the future.
